about_the_game:
Boulder Escape is an endless runner set in a medieval countryside. While out mining for precious metals an evil wizard cast a spell on a massive boulder. Now you must run and build whatever you can to stop the boulder from crushing you! Along the way you will need to dodge obstacles and gather resources for building supplies. The farther you travel the more upgrades you unlock! As you travel the countryside you will encounter merchants for vital boosts and hidden passages to help you escape the boulder!

Boulder Escape will not have in-game purchases for game content upgrades, boosts etc.

The following features will be included upon release:
  • Character Customization
  • Persistent Upgrades
  • In-game Boosts and Health Packs
  • Hidden Passages
  • High Score Board

  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950

short_description: Run! The boulder is out to get you! In this fast-paced runner you will need to gather resources, build obstacles, and dodge enemies. The longer you survive the more upgrades you unlock! Secrets and hidden passages await in this vibrant world.
